section.name: Contents
section.p:
The Java subproject consists of just one class:
javaURLContextFactory which provides a URL context factory for the "java:" URL scheme. The initial context factory method checks to see if the current thread or classloader is bound (see
ContextBindings) and if so, returns a
SelectorContext; otherwise a
NamingContext is created.

section.name: Usage
section.p: This should be used with naming-core, whenever support for java: URLs is required.
